com.four.qa.daoBase

类 BaseDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.springframework.orm.hibernate4.support.HibernateDaoSupport
        • com.four.qa.daoBase.BaseDao<T,PK>
  • 类型参数:
    T -
    PK -
    所有已实现的接口:
    IBaseDao<T,PK>, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    直接已知子类:
    AnswerDao, FSAnswerDao, FSTopicDao, QTPDao, QUDao, QuestionDao, TopicDao, UserInfoDao, UTPDao

    @Transactional(readOnly=false,
               propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)
public class BaseDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>
extends org.springframework.orm.hibernate4.support.HibernateDaoSupport
implements IBaseDao<T,PK>
    作者:
    Tiaoyu

        public T get(PK id)
        从接口复制的说明: IBaseDao
        根据ID获取对象. 实际调用Hibernate的session.load()方法返回实体或其proxy对象. 如果对象不存在，抛出异常.

        get 在接口中 IBaseDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>
